name: aesyros-suite

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "align,drive,pulse,catalyst,flow,foresight" -c "blue,orange,green,yellow,magenta,cyan" "npm run dev:align" "sleep 1 && npm run dev:drive" "sleep 2 && npm run dev:pulse" "sleep 3 && npm run dev:catalyst" "sleep 4 && npm run dev:flow" "sleep 5 && npm run dev:foresight"
scripts.services:dev: concurrently -n "gateway,align,pulse,catalyst,flow,foresight" -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta,cyan,red" "npm run services:gateway" "npm run services:align" "npm run services:pulse" "npm run services:catalyst" "npm run services:flow" "npm run services:foresight"
scripts.services:gateway: cd services/gateway && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.services:install:python: cd services/python-analytics/align-service && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../pulse-service && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../catalyst-service && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../flow-service && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../foresight-service && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.full-stack: concurrently -n "services,frontend" -c "blue,green" "npm run services:dev" "sleep 5 && npm run dev"
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:apps
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf apps/*/node_modules && rm -rf packages/*/node_modules && rm -rf apps/*/dist && rm -rf packages/*/dist
scripts.fresh: npm run clean && npm install && npm run install:all
scripts.preview: concurrently -n "align,drive,pulse,catalyst,flow,foresight" -c "blue,orange,green,yellow,magenta,cyan" "npm run preview:align" "npm run preview:drive" "npm run preview:pulse" "npm run preview:catalyst" "npm run preview:flow" "npm run preview:foresight"

description: Aesyros Suite - Strategic Operating System for modern organizations
